articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.content: TOKYO -- Japan looks to set a daily limit on the number of people entering the country even as it allows new exceptions to an arrival ban for international travelers, including those involved in the … [+2744 chars]
articles.description: Cap on entries proposed to take effect after Tokyo coronavirus emergency ends
articles.title: Japan eyes limit of 2000 daily arrivals as it opens for Olympics - Nikkei Asia

articles.author: BLOOMBERG
articles.description: BUDGET carrier AirAsia said it is seeking to launch a flying-taxi business as soon as next year.
articles.title: AirAsia plans to launch flying taxi service in 2022 - New Straits Times
